alert.note: Alert for Jones; Shackelford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 8:23PM CDT until April 19 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jones County in west central Texas... Southwestern Shackelford County in west central Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 822 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hamby, moving rapidly northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Albany around 850 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Big Country Baptist Assembly, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Mccarty Lake and The Intersection Of Us-180 And Farm Road 600. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
